name: firebase-oskey-example
description: Firebase Cloud Functions, Firestore rules and indexes, Cloud Storage rules and indexes, and emulator
author: Greg PFISTER <greg@oskey.io>

scripts.emul:build: (cd functions && rm -rf dist && npm run build -- --watch | (cd ../ && npm run emul))
scripts.emul:build:export: (cd functions && rm -rf dist && npm run build) && npm run emul:export
scripts.emul:build:import: (cd functions && rm -rf dist && npm run build) && npm run emul:import
scripts.test: firebase-cli emulators:exec '(cd test; npm run test)' --json --only auth,firestore,functions,pubsub,storage
scripts.test:bail: firebase-cli emulators:exec '(cd test; npm run test:bail)' --json --only auth,firestore,functions,pubsub,storage
scripts.test:export: firebase-cli emulators:exec '(cd test; npm run test:export)' --json --only auth,firestore,functions,pubsub,storage
scripts.test:export:bail: firebase-cli emulators:exec '(cd test; npm run test:export:bail)' --json --only auth,firestore,functions,pubsub,storage
scripts.test:progress: firebase-cli emulators:exec '(cd test; npm run test:progress)' --json --only auth,firestore,functions,pubsub,storage
scripts.test:ci: firebase-cli emulators:exec '(cd test; npm run test:ci)' --only auth,firestore,functions,pubsub,storage
scripts.test:ci:json: firebase-cli emulators:exec '(cd test; npm run test:ci:json)' --json --only auth,firestore,functions,pubsub,storage
